practice_phrases: 没问题。
No problem.
当然没问题。
Of course no problem.
这是没问题的。
This is no problem.
和他们一起没问题。
With them no problem.
我需要这么早离开没问题。
I need to leave so early, no problem.
她说这是没问题的。
She said this is no problem.
当你们一起工作时这是没问题的。
When you work together this is no problem.
我很高兴你认为和他们一起工作是没问题的。
I'm very happy you think working with them is no problem.
当然，做困难的事情和他们一起是没问题的。
Of course, doing difficult things with them is no problem.
我不知道为什么你认为当你和他们一起做困难的事情时这是没问题的。
I don't know why you think when you do difficult things with them this is no problem.
一切都好。
Everything is okay.
没问题，一切都好。
No problem, everything is okay.
我的朋友说一切都好。
My friend said everything is okay.
对不起，但一切都好。
I'm sorry, but everything is okay.
我很高兴一切都好。
I'm very happy everything is okay.
她说没问题，一切都好。
She said no problem, everything is okay.
当你和他们一起工作时一切都好。
When you work with them everything is okay.
我不知道为什么你认为一切都好，这是个惊喜。
I don't know why you think everything is okay, this is a surprise.
当然你可以问她，因为她说一切都好。
Of course you can ask her, because she said everything is okay.
这是我朋友想要和我们见面的地方，因为一切都好，没问题。
This is where my friend wanted to meet us, because everything is okay, no problem.
